parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup schedule. To obtain this parameter, call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token used to ensure the idempotence of the request. This prevents the submission of duplicate requests.

parameters.name: EndTimestamp
parameters.description: The UNIX timestamp that represents the end of the backup.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be greater than or equal to 0 and cannot exceed the maximum value of an integer. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of records on each page. Valid values: 30, 50, and 100.

> The default value is 30.

parameters.name: ShowStorageType
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to display the storage class. Valid values:

- true

- false

> Default value: true.

parameters.name: StartTimestamp
parameters.description: The UNIX timestamp that represents the start of the backup.
